article_title: The Cynical Political Double-Cross Of Young Americans

article_metadata.author: Grace-Marie Turner

og.description: Young people today have been “disinherited” from America’s promise of economic opportunity because of profligate government spending and the endless expansion of the welfare state.  That is the premise of the important and highly-relevant new book, Disinherited: How Washington is Betraying America’s Young, by Diana Furchtgott-Roth and Jared Meyer of [...]
